entry.title: Delivery date field update after PO confirmation posted
entry.content:
Subject: SAP Configuration Options for PO Delivery Date Update Behavior

Hi SAP Community 

I‚Äôm reaching out to explore whether there‚Äôs any SAP configuration that could help us address an issue.

Currently there are production delays or demand changes after PO confirmation  where we need to update the shipping mode or WROUTE at the PO item level. These changes affect lead times, and currently, the system automatically updates the delivery date in the delivery schedule tab (EKET-EIND).

Updating the delivery date after PO is confirmed is impacting our data analytics reports. Business is requiring to stop updating the delivery date in the delivery schedule tab (EKET-EIND). 

Before we consider any development, I‚Äôd like to know if there‚Äôs any standard configuration or enhancement option that could help us control or prevent the automatic update of the delivery date when ship mode or WROUTE changes‚Äîideally without affecting downstream logic.

Appreciate any guidance or suggestions you might have!

entry.title: Re: WPDTC tcode calculation of PDT and deviation calculated?
entry.content:
To see exactly why it‚Äôs 2.0:

  1. Note the PO number and item from the WPDTC line.
  2. Go to ME23N ‚Üí PO History tab for that item.
  3. Sum the GR quantities (movement type 101) that fall into your WPDTC selection period.
  4. Divide by the PO item quantity; you will likely get ~2.0.
  5. Check for reversals (102) and re‚Äëpostings; if they‚Äôre in your selection, they can inflate the total.

entry.title: Can we create an intercompany stock transfer order for project stock?
entry.content:
We have following case. We have a project belonging to a NL company code.

The procurements is done in the BE entity and also goods are stored in the BE entity for that project on project stock.

On the moment construction starts the goods must be shipped to a storage location in the NL entity and remain in project stock. When the goods are consumed on site they will be issued on project stock in S/4HANA

At the end an intercompany invoice must be raised to transfer the goods from one entity to the other. How can we set up the IC flow for project stock in S/4HANA public cloud ?

regards

Bernard

entry.title: Signavio Process Intelligence - SAP ABAP on Prem System Connection failed
entry.content:
Issue: SAP Signavio On-Premises Extractor -- Invalid SAP Connection

I have used this sap doc to configure this scenario - Connector - SAP ERP (RFC) | SAP Help Portal

Context

  • On-Premises Extractor installed and running on Linux with Java 17.

  • Extractor connects successfully to Signavio WebSocket (TLS/network OK).

  • SAP system reachable (dispatcher port open).

  • Connection in Signavio configured with valid SAP Dialog user (SAP_ALL + SAP_NEW, password logon allowed).

  • SAP GUI logon works fine with the same user, client, and password.

 

 

Problem

When testing the SAP RFC connection in Signavio, the extractor logs show:

 

 
Invalid credentials : NOT_FOUND ... cdata.jdbc.saperp.SAPERPDriver.connect(...)

This indicates that the extractor reaches SAP, but the SAP driver rejects the credentials.
I have already tried entering the username in UPPERCASE, but the error remains.

 

Cross-checks Performed

  1. Postman ‚Üí CPI ‚úÖ works

  2. Signavio ‚Üí CPI (same endpoint as above) ‚ùå fails

  3. Signavio ‚Üí SAP backend RFC (via On-Prem Extractor) ‚ùå fails

  4. SAP PO ‚Üí SAP backend RFC ‚úÖ works

The same SAP backend system and connection parameters work fine for SAP PO and other tools, but Signavio cannot connect when using the same endpoints.

Question

  • Has anyone else encountered the ‚ÄúInvalid credentials : NOT_FOUND‚Äù error when configuring an SAP RFC connection in Signavio?

  • Are there special requirements for how client, username, or password must be specified (e.g., restrictions on password characters)?

Looking for guidance on why the same back end SAP connection works fine in SAP PO and SAP GUI, but fails when tested from Signavio On-Premises Extractor.

entry.title: Employee using QR code to self register to course and have attendance marked and learning recorded
entry.content:
We‚Äôd like to know if it‚Äôs possible for employees attending a course to record their own attendance by scanning a QR code, without any action needed from the instructor.

The instructors are external and don‚Äôt have access to our LMS. Our idea is to provide the instructor with a printed QR code, which they can display at the end of the course. Employees would then scan the QR code on their mobile devices, and this action would automatically mark their attendance and record the learning in the LMS.

Is this setup possible?

entry.title: Re: ‚Äåüé©‚ÄåThe Magic of Attributes in SAP IAS: Default vs Enrich Assertion
entry.content:
Hi @dyaryura ,

Its a valid use case, however IAS mostly supports functions (lowercase , uppercase) and regex can mostly be used for filter.

From IAS documentation i can check that - Currently it is not supported, we can raise a feature request to IAS team to consider this scenario and use case. and below is the maximum which is supported by IAS:

<attribute_name> = <prefix> ${corporateIdP.<corporateIdP_attribute_name><:regex[filter]><:function[<method>]>} <suffix>

 Parameter Required Notes
attribute_nameYesThe name of the attribute as defined in the administration console. Free text.
prefixNoFree text.
corporateIdPYesFixed string, indicating that the value is taken from the assertion coming from the corporate IdP.
corporateIdP_attribute_nameYesThe specific attribute from the corporate IdP, whose value is taken.
:regex[<filter>]NoFilter the attributes from the corporate IdP.
:function[<method>]No

Methods to convert the attributes. Currently the supported methods are:

  • uppercase - the attribute is converted to uppercase letters.

  • lowercase - the attribute is converted to lowercase letters.

suffixNoFree text.

Now let's see some alternatives to implement this:

- In most of the scenarios - with these kind of requirements, we usually perform it in Identity provider or service provider, Like you said one way is to perform the operation at entra AD directly and use custom attribute to send it in assertion, or we can try at the service provider side where application accepts the whole UPN and then perform the string manipulation on its end.

- IPS can be used to sync that value from source to target - but i think it will be more efforts than just doing it on IDP or SP side.

entry.title: Re: Delivery date field update after PO confirmation posted
entry.content:
Unfortunately, there is no single IMG switch to say ‚Äúdon‚Äôt update EKET‚ÄëEIND when these fields change‚Äù.  SAP assumes that if you change a lead‚Äëtime‚Äërelevant field, you want the schedule line dates recalculated.

That said, with some standard configuration options, there are a couple of standard levers you can check:

  • In SPRO ‚Üí Materials Management ‚Üí Purchasing ‚Üí Purchase Order ‚Üí Define Screen Layout at Document Level, you can make certain fields display‚Äëonly after PO confirmation, so they can‚Äôt be changed without cancelling the confirmation. This prevents the trigger altogether.
  • If you‚Äôre using PO confirmations (ZF/AB/ZB/ZG), the confirmation control key can be set up so that certain changes don‚Äôt trigger rescheduling ‚Äî but this is limited and doesn‚Äôt cover all fields.
  • In some industries, you can use ‚Äústatistical delivery date‚Äù fields for reporting instead of EKET‚ÄëEIND, so that operational changes don‚Äôt affect your analytics date.


The next option is if you want to suppress the date overwrite, and you want to allow the WROUTE/ship mode change. The cleanest enhancement points are BAdI ME_PROCESS_PO_CUST or User exit EXIT_SAPMM06E_013

entry.title: Re: Getting error while using this ODATA API to create bi...
entry.content:
Hello @anijaambika 

I have been analysing the error, and might have found why you received the error.
SDBIL_BD_RAP/012 is not supported because it's an SD document. The category is PBRQ, which means your reference is a Billing Document Request (BDR). BDRs (SD doc category PBRQ) are not valid input for the Billing Document API action POST /BillingDocument/SAP__self.CreateFromSDDocument. That action only accepts billable SD document categories, such as deliveries or order-related requests, like debit/credit memo requests. SAP Help Portal-Operations for Billing Document

Alternative options 2 supported paths.

If you must invoice the BDR
Use the standard BDR process to create the billing document: run Release Billing Requests (Fiori app) or the corresponding background job. There is a dedicated Billing Document Request API, but it is for read / reject/delete; creation of the billing document from a BDR is handled by the release/billing run, not by CreateFromSDDocument.

When integrating via the Billing Document API, create a billable SD document (e.g., a delivery or debit/credit memo request) and make a call to POST /BillingDocument/SAP__self.CreateFromSDDocument, referencing that document. This scenario is specifically supported by the API. SAP Help Portal-Operations for Billing Document

The flag AutomPostingToAcctgIsDisabled=true isn‚Äôt the root of your error; the real issue is the PBRQ category of the input document.

Helpful SAP Documentation

Billing Document Request ‚Äì API & Apps (read/reject/delete via API, release via app/job). SAP Business Accelerator Hub-Business Accelerator Hub

Let me know how it goes

With regards

Chuma

entry.title: Re: Fiori Launchpad / error 403 while Service is active
entry.content: I am facing a similar issue, we recently upgraded the system and everything works fine in dev and quality, but facing the below issue in production An error occurred while loading this page. This might have happened due to one of the following reasons: - The page or space has been removed or is no longer assigned to you. - The URL might be corrupt. Among other things, this might be caused by a corrupt bookmark. Please copy the complete error message by using the Copy button below and contact your content administrator. PageId: "SAP_CA_PG_MIG" SpaceId: "SAP_CA_SP_MIG" The original error message from the corresponding loading request is:{"component":"sap.ushell.services.NavigationDataProvider","description":"The navigation target data for the tiles on this page could not be loaded due to an error.","detail":"/sap/bc/ui2/start_up?so=%2A&action=%2A&systemAliasesFormat=object&sap-language=EN&sap-client=500&shellType=FLP&depth=0&sap-cache-id=87F249B86E826998133B906AE9B61FAF: 403 Forbidden"} , also this issue Fiori Launchpad does not display any tiles even when the user has correct application roles assigned. Fiori Launcpad search fails with error: App could not be opened either due to an incorrect SAP Fiori launchpad configuration or a missing role assignment. Failed to resolve navigation target "#Action-search". This is most likely caused by an incorrect SAP Fiori launchpad content configuration or by a missing role assignment. In the network trace of browser developer tool (F12 key) you can see the /sap/bc/ui2/start_up request returns 403 forbidden.there is an sap note '3368272' which depicts the exact issue i am facing , it shows resolution as changing security requirement in logon data to standard from ssl , but everything seems to work fine in dev and qa with ssl security requirement

entry.title: Re: Can we create an intercompany stock transfer order fo...
entry.content:
What you are describing is essentially a cross‚Äëcompany‚Äëcode stock transfer of project stock, with the twist that the stock must remain assigned to the WBS element (project stock) after it moves from BE to NL, and that you want an intercompany billing at the end. In SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, there are two main intercompany process frameworks you can leverage ‚Äî but there are also some important restrictions when it comes to valuated project stock.

For information, Project stock in S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition is valuated and tied to a WBS element. Cross‚Äëcompany movements of project stock are not handled by the ‚Äúclassic‚Äù project stock transfer transactions (like MB1B) ‚Äî they need to go through an intercompany stock transfer process so that both the logistics movement and the financial intercompany posting happen.

In Public Cloud, intercompany processes are delivered as scope items:

  1. 1P9 ‚Äì Intercompany Stock Transfer (classic)
  2. 5HP ‚Äì Advanced Intercompany Stock Transfer (new framework with value chain monitoring)
  3. 1WO / 5D2 ‚Äì Intercompany Sales (if you want to model it as a sale rather than a stock transfer)

To decide which process fits your case and since you want:

  • Stock to remain project‚Äëassigned after the move
  • Physical movement from BE plant to NL plant (different company codes)
  • Intercompany invoice at the end

the closest fit in Public Cloud is Advanced Intercompany Stock Transfer (scope item 5HP), but you need to check whether WBS‚Äëassigned stock is supported in your release. As of recent releases, Advanced ICO supports valuated stock in transit and can carry account assignment (like WBS) through the transfer ‚Äî but this is something to confirm in your tenant or with SAP, because in some earlier releases project stock was excluded from ICO scope.

entry.title: Re: Audit Report/Tracking of "Budget Override" Functionality
entry.content:
Hi @xavierlegarrec,

Thank you for your feedback and for sharing the KBA reference.

To give you more context: in our customer‚Äôs process, there is a business need to manage budget transfers between planners. Initially, we configured the budget in Direct Amount mode, but we faced limitations regarding visibility in the Executive Review (e.g., Matrix Manager).

Because of this, we enabled the Budget Override functionality, which met the requirement of adjusting the budget between planners. However, the project requires us to have control and traceability of the changes made (audit purposes).

We validated the scenario mentioned in the KBA, but the report referenced there seems to apply only to Variable Pay data and appears related to the standard column Override (totalFinalPayout), not to the Budget Override functionality we are using in Compensation. I included below some attempts used to generate this scenario and the limitations encountered.

- Direct Amount (Limitation of certain views in Executive Review and audit data)

- Compensation Audit Report (Does not show budget override data)

- Validation Report > Override (Limited to Variable Pay)

- Ad Hoc Reports (Does not show budget override data)

From what we have reviewed so far, it seems there may not be a native way to audit changes made through the Budget Override feature in Compensation. Could you kindly confirm if this is indeed the case? If so, we understand that the main alternatives would be to manage it at the employee level, for example through a custom column or an MDF approach.

Thank you once again for your support.

entry.title: Re: Share Story Report issue
entry.content:
@salimo,

This error can occur for several reasons, but the most common is related to the user that you are trying to share the report with not existing in SAC. This can be checked by following the steps in this KBA: https://me.sap.com/notes/2989998/E

If you can confirm that the user exists in SAC, there are other possible root causes as listed in this KBA: https://me.sap.com/notes/3621006/E

Hopefully one of these can resolve your issue. If not, I'd advise you to open a ticket after checking the KBA's for additional root causes.

entry.title: Dynamically setting chart positions based on measure values
entry.content:
The 4 KPIs (numeric point charts) are dynamically positioned left to right based on the measure value they contain.
  Highest on the left , lowest at the far right.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Setup overview
1. Script variable: 'charts'   type: chart    array: true

2. Onitialisation Script

// populate the dropdown with members of the sales manager dimension
var mem=Chart_1.getDataSource().getMembers("Sales_Manager__5w3m5d06b5");
Dropdown_1.addItem('All');
for (var i=0;i<mem.length;i++)
	{Dropdown_1.addItem(mem[i].id,mem[i].description);}
Dropdown_1.setSelectedKey('All');

//populate the charts script variable with all charts in the story
charts=Application.getWidgets({type:WidgetType.Chart});


3. Dropdown_1 onSelect Script

var key=this.getSelectedKey();
for(var i=0;i<charts.length;i++)	{charts[i].getDataSource().removeDimensionFilter("Sales_Manager__5w3m5d06b5");
	 if(key!=='All') {	 charts[i].getDataSource().setDimensionFilter("Sales_Manager__5w3m5d06b5",key);}}

Timer_1.start(1);

4. Timer_1  onTimeout Script

// re-order charts high to low - left to right

// Step 1: Set up two typed arrays
var chartNames = ArrayUtils.create(Type.Chart);  // chart.getName()
var chartValues = ArrayUtils.create(Type.number); // converted rawValue

// Step 2: Populate both arrays
for (var ia = 0; ia < charts.length; ia++) {
    var name = charts[ia];
    var raw = charts[ia].getDataSource().getResultSet()[0][Alias.MeasureDimension].rawValue;
    var value = ConvertUtils.stringToNumber(raw);

    chartNames.push(name);
    chartValues.push(value);
}

// Step 3: Bubble sort both arrays together ‚Äî high to low
for (var i = 0; i < chartValues.length - 1; i++) {
    for (var j = 0; j < chartValues.length - i - 1; j++) {
        if (chartValues[j] < chartValues[j + 1]) {
            // Swap values
            var tempVal = chartValues[j];
            chartValues[j] = chartValues[j + 1];
            chartValues[j + 1] = tempVal;

            // Swap corresponding chart names
            var tempName = chartNames[j];
            chartNames[j] = chartNames[j + 1];
            chartNames[j + 1] = tempName;
        }
    }
}

// Define starting position and spacing
var leftPos = 50;         // Starting X position
var spacingGap = 50;      // Gap between charts

// Reposition each chart based on the previous chart's width
for (var iz = 0; iz < chartNames.length; iz++) {
    var chart = chartNames[iz];

    // Set chart left position
    chart.getLayout().setLeft(leftPos);

    // Update leftPos for the next chart
    var chartWidth = chart.getLayout().getWidth().value; // Get current chart width
    leftPos = leftPos + chartWidth + spacingGap;
}

The Chart sorting is placed in a Timer as we need to ensure the data has fully refreshed before trying to retrieve the values and apply the chart sort.

entry.title: Unable to access apps in launchpad- sap/bc/ui2/startup 403 forbidden status code
entry.content:
I am unable to access any of the apps in production , getting the below mentioned error.

 
An error occurred while loading this page. This might have happened due to one of the following reasons: - The page or space has been removed or is no longer assigned to you. - The URL might be corrupt. Among other things, this might be caused by a corrupt bookmark. Please copy the complete error message by using the Copy button below and contact your content administrator. PageId: "SAP_BASIS_PG_UI_FLP" SpaceId: "SAP_BASIS_SP_UI_FLP"

Symptom

  • Fiori Launchpad does not display any tiles even when the user has correct application roles assigned.
  • Fiori Launcpad search fails with error:

App could not be opened either due to an incorrect SAP Fiori launchpad configuration or a missing role assignment.

Failed to resolve navigation target "#Action-search". This is most likely caused by an incorrect SAP Fiori launchpad content configuration or by a missing role assignment.
  • In the network trace of browser developer tool (F12 key) you can see the  /sap/bc/ui2/start_up request returns 403 forbidden.

Imp note--- We recently upgraded to new system, everything seems to be working fine in Dev and QA. All the services needed for launchpad are activated. Basis team downloaded the roles and authorization from production and assigned it to a test user in both dev and qa , everything works fine . issue only lies in production 

Trouble shooting steps we have tried:

1. All the services are active , all the roles are authorizations are same as dev and quality.

2. I referred to sap note '3368272' which describes the exact issue i am facing , there they have given the resolution to change the security requirement in logon data of /ui2/startup node from ssl to standard, whereas everything works fine in development and quality with SSL security requirement.

We have been facing this issue for 2 weeks now , tried everything we could think of , this issue needs to be resolved asap.

Please provide your inputs , what could help.

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: Group reporting: Unable to Consolidate correctly Equity based method entities- indirect shareholding
entry.content:
Dear community, I have the following Group structure and would like to know why my consolidation is not producing the anticipated results: with Group reporting cloud based version using Rules based Cost of investments.

Group structure : Single Group A where:

Company J184 is the Holding company and  company J0196  and company 197 are both Equity based investments. 

Company J0184 owns 30% in Company J0196. The participation ( cost of investment) of J0184 in J0196 is  52,000

Company J196 owns 40% in company J0197. The Participation( cost of investment) of J0196 in J0197 is 8,000

The Group share of J184 in J0197 is 30% x 40% =12%.

All data that has been imported into the system is data import.png.

Once the consolidation has been run, I see immediately that the Cost of investment of J0196 in J0197 is eliminated twice, once through the PCC process in Document 0Z preparation of Group changes -8000 and also document 3A  investment of Equity elimination -8000.  So the cost of investment 172100 is eliminated twice. 

How should the system be set up so that the cost of investment is not eliminated twice and we have an over elimination which is clearly incorrect.  I also see other issues but I would like to start the discussion here. Looking forward to hearing from an expert on this soon.

kind regards

Colin

entry.title: Re: how to release record that has been created from BAPI...
entry.content:
Hello @karan3032l 

There is no such a function a reservation release. You can set "movement allowed" field in a reservation, so a material document can be posted against the reservation. That can be done either with MB22 or MBVR. However that won't change stock levels.

I guess you want to post a material document against the reservation. That can be done with MIGO.

Best regards

Dominik Tylczynski

entry.title: Re: how to release record that has been created from BAPI_RESERVATION_CREATE1
entry.content: Please don't post in all caps - that looks like shouting.

entry.title: Re: Signavio Process Intelligence - SAP ABAP on Prem Syst...
entry.content: @AkumaryafirAk The evidence conclusively points to a misconfiguration of the SAP Java Connector (JCo) used by the On-Premises Extractor, not your SAP user credentials or permissions. The error NOT_FOUND is a classic JCo indicator that it cannot find the specified destination or establish a proper connection context, which the CData driver then misleadingly reports as an "Invalid credentials" error.Your SAP user works in SAP GUI and PO because they use native SAP connectivity libraries. The Signavio Extractor uses a Java-based stack that relies on a correctly configured JCo layer, which is not being set up properly via the Signavio UI alone

  Wolfgang

entry.title: Re: how to release record that has been created from BAPI_RESERVATION_CREATE1
entry.content: Please avoid using CAPS to your post as it is widely interpreted as ‚Äúshouting‚Äù

entry.title: Re: how to release record that has been created from BAPI...
entry.content:
Please note, when you create a reservation with BAPI_RESERVATION_CREATE1, you are only creating the requirement record in table RESB/RKPF and it does not move stock. That is why you don‚Äôt see any change in unrestricted stock. If your goal is to ‚Äúrelease‚Äù it so that the stock is actually moved from unrestricted to the reservation (or consumed from it), you need to follow up with the appropriate goods movement posting.

Further, in the context of "Release", there‚Äôs no separate ‚Äúrelease‚Äù function for a reservation. The reservation affects available stock immediately (ATP check), but unrestricted stock quantity in MMBE only changes when you post a goods issue against the reservation. If you want to ‚Äúfree‚Äù the stock back to unrestricted, you either delete the reservation, or post a goods movement that reverses the reservation consumption.

So to post and clear the Reservation, with the standard transactions like MB1A or MIGO, where select Goods Issue ‚Üí Reference Document = Reservation. Enter your reservation number, movement type and post. Alternatively, you can also post the stock via BAPI_GOODSMVT_CREATE

entry.title: Re: Unravelling the ‚Äòtechnical user‚Äô propagation scenarios in SAP Integration Suite
entry.content:
@tomastoth - since you've mentioned Edge Integration Cell - propagating the principal (user or technical) in a manner described in this blog is not possible for the reason that EIC does not (cannot) leverage the BTP Connectivity layer at this moment of writing. This is on the roadmap.

Nevertheless, steps 5.1 and 5.2 cannot be performed on the IFlow as it is directly related to the Cloud Connector and backend runtimes, respectively.

entry.title: Late Stay Hours vs. Varying Operating Times - SAP TM PUDL
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I‚Äôm looking for some guidance to see if anyone has dealt with this scenario before and found a good solution.

Our client has a rule that for sales orders raised with delivery priority 5, the requested delivery date can be extended by 5 days. This extension must respect the customer‚Äôs working hours and cannot deliver on weekends.

In the PUDL condition for delivery priority 5, I‚Äôve maintained the operating hours check and added 50 hours of late stay. Since this customer operates 10-hour days, the system correctly calculates the extended requested delivery date.

The challenge is that our client has many customers with different operating hours. Using a standard 50-hour late stay results in inconsistent delivery dates depending on each customer‚Äôs operating hours.

Has anyone come across this issue and found a way to consistently apply a set-day rule while still accounting for different operating hours?

Thank you,

entry.title: Re: How can I call a cds odata from ABAP so that it will...
entry.content:
Yes, you can.
But you don‚Äôt need to call the OData service. SAP gives us Entity Manipulation Language (EML) in ABAP.

EML is like SQL, but for RAP BO (Behavior Objects).

With EML you can do CREATE / UPDATE / DELETE directly from ABAP.

All the behavior logic (validations, determinations, authorizations) will run automatically.

Suppose you have a RAP BO called Z_I_PLAYER (interface view).

ABAP code will look like this:

DATA lt_update TYPE TABLE FOR UPDATE z_Player.

lt_update = VALUE #(
( %key-uuid = '1234567890ABCDEF'
player_name = 'Virat Kohli'
player_score = 100 )
).

MODIFY ENTITIES OF z_Player
ENTITY player
UPDATE FIELDS ( player_name player_score )
WITH lt_update
FAILED DATA(ls_failed)
REPORTED DATA(ls_reported).

Option 2:
If you want to use the existing Function Module (FM) to update the database table, then remove the COMMIT WORK and ROLLBACK WORK statements from it. Otherwise, the RAP framework will give a runtime error.

If you do not want to remove the COMMIT or ROLLBACK statements from the FM, then call the FM through a SUBMIT program instead.

Regards,

Akshath L.T

entry.title: Auto mail to be Trigger to multiple mail id maintained in Customer Master
entry.content:
Hi,

This is to inform you that our client wanted to send auto mail to multiple customers mail if maintained in customer master. Currently we have already maintained details in Output parameter determination and auto mail is triggering from system after posting the Invoice.

Kindly guide us how we can send mails to multiple mail id maintained in customer master.

Thanks

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Re: Auto mail to be Trigger to multiple mail id maintaine...
entry.content:
Retrieving more than one email address from business partner master data is currently not supported.

Please review Chapter 4.2.5 Determining Email Recipients of the Output Management Set-Up Instructions

Currently, the email addresses can be maintained in two places in case several email addresses should be used:

  1. Maintain one email address (default email address) in the business partner master data and
  2. Maintain additional email addresses directly in the step Email Recipient in the Output Parameter Determination app.
    With an excel import/export, also a large number of email addresses can be maintained in the Output Parameter Determination app.

entry.title: Re: TDS provisioning
entry.content:
Hello @Rishav4 

Hello [Customer Name],

Thanks for sharing the details and screenshots.I have analysed the situation, and here's the resolution:

Reverse the incorrect utilisation entry.

Journal Entry 100000083 (‚Çπ6,001) requires reversal, as it doesn't match the original provision.

Re-post the utilisation with the correct amount

Repost the utilisation for ‚Çπ6,000, which will correctly clear against the original provision (Journal Entry 100000082).

This guarantees a precise match between the provision created and utilised.

Configure rounding difference handling

In Central Business Configuration (CBC), enable automatic posting of rounding differences by assigning a specific rounding difference G/L account (SSCUI 100297).

This prevents minor mismatches of ‚Çπ1 from being posted into provisions in the future.

Check assignment logic

In the Manage Journal Entries app, review the Assigned Items of the provision entry to ensure that each provision line is linked only once.

That should prevent the doubling effect you saw (‚Çπ12,002) in the assigned values.

Once these steps are complete, the provision cycle will consistently reflect this:

Provision created: ‚Çπ6,000

Provision utilised: ‚Çπ6,000

Any rounding discrepancies will be automatically recorded in the rounding difference account.

Go ahead with the reversal and reposting and let us know if you'd like us to walk you through the CBC configuration for rounding differences.

Let me know if you need further support

With regards

Chuma

entry.title: MustUnderstand headers are not understood
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,

For integration from Microsoft Application (MS) against SAP ERP system via SAP Cloud Integration system starts got error when  MS side call SOAP service interface after being working well in the last month, the issue starts getting this week on SAP CI Production.

We analysed in detail the issue and we found the followings:

  • the failed messages sent from MS side are not listed in the SAP CI Monitor; just it is found the entries related to the error in the http and trace files:

Entry of HTTP File:

x.x.x.x (x.x.x.x) - - [11/09/2025:10:11:19 +0000] "POST /cxf/productionorder/update HTTP/1.1" 401 104ms - -

Entry of Trace File at 11.09.25: respect to 10:11:19:

2025-09-11 10:11:19#+0000#INFO#com.sap.it.security.multicloud.authentication.AuthConfigurationFactory#anonymous#http-nio2-8080-exec-13#com.sap.it.security.multicloud.authentication#na#na#na#na#Neither client certificate nor Authorization header found. Returning  no auth type#f747460a-2903-477f-5106-92aad8cb5cf7#x.x.x.x#1

  • we have checked that MS Test and Production systems have the SAP CI SSL certificates.
  • we have tested the SOAP Service Interface via Postman manually, and it is got error processing "mustUnderstand=1" attribute as part of the Header of the Payload, based on the error message displayed on Postman:

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">    <soap:Body>        <soap:Fault>            <faultcode>soap:MustUnderstand</faultcode>            <faultstring>MustUnderstand headers: [{http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2005/05/addressing/none}Action] are not understood.</faultstring>        </soap:Fault>    </soap:Body></soap:Envelope>

Nothing was changed (WSDL definition related to the SOAP Service Update Production Order interface or SW update on MA Production side).

We don¬¥t understand why the SOAP Sender Adapter (Communication Channel) is not able to process the new messages suddenly even though have the same structure/content; the "mustUnderstand=1"  Attribute/Value was well process before. This interface was running well on Production until last week.

Any help or hint will be appreciate. Thanks in advance.

Best Regards,

Maria Orellana

entry.title: Re: Tax on Customer Advance and Subsequent Sales
entry.content:
Hi Bohdan,

I am working on a similar requirement for Saudi and UAE where the requirement is to post output tax on the down payment request like as below

Issuance of Advance Tax Invoice:

  • Dr Customer A/R (including tax)                                                             58.95
  • Cr Down Payment Clearing ‚Äì Special GL (net amount)                              51.26
  • Cr Tax Payable (VAT Output)                                                                                    7.69

The Accounting entries expected on Incoming Down payment is 

Advance Receipt from customer:

  • Dr Bank (including tax)                                                                      58.95
  • Cr Customer A/R (including tax)                                                                   58.9

Issuance of Final Tax Invoice:

  • Dr Customer A/R (including tax)                                              235.80
  • Dr Down Payment Clearing ‚Äì Special GL(net amount)              51.26                
  • Cr Sales account                                                                                                           256.30
  • Cr Tax Payable (VAT Output)                                                                                    30.76

Note: Net VAT on the balance payment to be booked as one line, if possible

Please let me know whether this accounting entries can be achieved and if so what are the additional configuration changes which needed to be done.

I was not able to access the link shared in your earlier post, please share the updated link and documentation which you might have which would help me to fix this issue.

Regards

Mohammed Roshan

entry.title: Como criar blogs incr√≠veis a partir das palestras dos eventos SAP?
entry.content:
@moshenaveh compartilhou uma metodologia pr√°tica para transformar apresenta√ß√µes de eventos em blogs r√°pidos e envolventes. Eis os passos-chave:

1Ô∏è‚É£Use o tutorial do SAP Community para habilitar o blogging.
2Ô∏è‚É£Crie um template dedicado ao evento (pr√© e p√≥s-evento).
3Ô∏è‚É£Transforme sua apresenta√ß√£o em texto com apoio de IA.
4Ô∏è‚É£Revise gram√°tica/estilo com ferramentas de IA.
5Ô∏è‚É£Enrique√ßa com imagens, slides e m√≠dia.
6Ô∏è‚É£Seja transparente ‚Üí use a tag GenAIAssistedContent.
7Ô∏è‚É£Publique na se√ß√£o correta da comunidade.
8Ô∏è‚É£Promova nas redes sociais e interaja nos coment√°rios.

Essa abordagem reduz o tempo de cria√ß√£o de horas para minutos, motiva mais palestrantes a compartilhar conhecimento  e amplia o impacto das sess√µes.

Que tal aplicar essas dicas no pr√≥ximo evento que voc√™ participar?

Vejam este blog como exemplo criado a partir de palestras realizadas

<entry xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"

entry.title: SAP Developer News September 11th, 2025
entry.content:
DESCRIPTION 

Podcast: https://podcast.opensap.info/sap-developers/2025/09/11/sap-developer-news-september-11th-2025/ 

CAP August 2025 release 

  • Release notes https://cap.cloud.sap/docs/releases/aug25  

ABAP AI - Chapter 2 

  • Blog post: https://community.sap.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-blog-posts-by-sap/abap-ai-chapter-2/ba-p/14210568 

SAP Business Data Cloud Series 

  • SAP Business Data Cloud Series ‚Äì Part 3: Customer-Managed Data Products: https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-sap/sap-business-data-cloud-series-part-3-customer-managed-data-products/ba-p/14195545 
  • SAP Databricks in SAP Business Data Cloud ‚Äì a Typical Machine Learning Workflow: https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-sap/sap-databricks-in-sap-business-data-cloud-a-typical-machine-learning/ba-p/14206612 
  • Data and AI at Devtoberfest: https://community.sap.com/t5/devtoberfest/eb-p/devtoberfest-events/label-name/data%20analytics%20ai  

Devtoberfest 2025 

  • Devtoberfest 2025: https://community.sap.com/t5/devtoberfest-blog-posts/devtoberfest-2025-welcome/ba-p/14182817 

SAP TechEd Agenda Builder 

  • Ceci‚Äôs blog post: https://community.sap.com/t5/sap-teched-blog-posts/put-your-thinking-cap-on-it-s-time-to-make-some-tough-choices/ba-p/14211727 
  • SAP TechEd Session Catalog and Agenda Builder: https://www.sap.com/events/teched/berlin/flow/sap/te25/catalog-inperson/page/catalog 
  • SAP TechEd Berlin: https://www.sap.com/events/teched/berlin.html 
  • SAP TechEd Virtual: https://www.sap.com/events/teched/virtual.html 

 

CHAPTER TITLES  

0:00 Intro 

0:10 CAP Aug 2025 release 

6:04 ABAP AI - Chapter 2 

7:25 SAP Business Data Cloud Series 

8:40 Devtoberfest 2025 

9:55 SAP TechEd Agenda Builder 

 

TRANSCRIPTION

[Intro] This is the SAP Developer News for September 11th, 2025.

[DJ] In case you missed it, the August 2025 release of CAP has landed with myriad updates. Now, this is going to be a slightly longer news item than usual, so grab a cup of tea and settle in. So, front and center for us all is the brand new cap‚âΩire organization on GitHub, which contains a reorganized set of repos, including individual sample repos, plus the cap‚âΩire documentation source repo itself, where contributions are welcome. Along with this reorganization comes continuous content deployments and a setup of package publication, which is great, not least for package reuse. And this cap‚âΩire organization is also the new home for discussions all around Cap. Check it out. So now in the new and recently GA, generally available topic, we can see that the previously beta-only support for persistent Fiori draft messages has now graduated and become GA. Also, there's a new MCP server for Cap that can provide AI-powered development help. Talking of GA in the language and compiler topic you may remember the introduction of support for expressions as first class annotation values well that support is also now GA. Staying in the language and compiler topic the query compiler has a new optimization for path expressions involving managed to one associations. A foreign key path expression is now translated to the local foreign key column instead of the joined remote one in the Node.js runtime this is now default and you can turn it on with a switch in the Java runtime. Now in a related update you can now collapse foreign key path expressions for managed to one associations into something simpler and let auto-coercion resolve this view into the more specific single foreign key specification like this example shown in a where clause. Now moving to the Node.js and Java runtimes there are plenty of updates too. Let's start with Node.js. There's a feature that was first introduced in the Java runtime back in April this year. This has also now been made available in Node.js. It's how elements that are annotated with common.txt are automatically included when a dollar search request is processed. Great stuff. There's also now a new database service level feature that allows you to stream query results direct from the persistence layer to the HTTP response, bypassing any need to materialize the result set in memory. There are also new features relating to requiring and connecting to remote services, a new utility method for working with linked definitions, and a new container for authentication-related information. And that's cdsuser.authinfo. This replaces the now deprecated cdsuser.tokeninfo. Moving to the Java runtime, there are quality of life, quality of dev life improvements when working with query results. For typed queries the results are automatically typed and you don't need to provide the access interface anymore if you're using the single list of or stream of methods. Now for single tenant applications, this is staying in a Java runtime right now, the feature attachment plugin now supports in an alpha version the SAP BTP object store and now you'll need a service binding to an object store backend. AWS's S3, Azure's blob storage, and Google's cloud storage are all supported. Now you may already know of CDS generate, part of the CDS Maven plugin, which automatically generates access interfaces for all structured CDS model types. This feature has been evolving and the team recommends you do use this as it brings benefits and in turn allows better compile time checking. Now, there's lots of detailed documentation on this, just waiting for your reading pleasure in cap‚âΩire, so go and check it out. Last but not least, there's now a convenience URL that you can directly select from the console log output, and it'll take you directly to the server's index page. Nice. Moving on to the tools area, the CDS plugin for IntelliJ is now at 2.0.0, and is now fully compatible with the free community edition of IntelliJ, which means that anyone and everyone can use IntelliJ for CAP development. The new 2.0.0 version brings lots of IDE features, lots of new features for the IDE, enhanced LSP integration and new options in the settings page. And there are also in the tools topic, new ESLint checks for JavaScript, making your life as a developer easier and the life of your code smoother. There are five safety checks so far, take a look in the cds lint section of cap hire. And last but certainly not least in this release there's been some awesome work in the area of GitHub actions, a new guide, sample workflows and lots more to help you manage test, deploy, package and release your CAP projects. Now that is cool. All this and more in the August 2025 release section of the CapHire documentation. Thanks, CapTeam.

 [Mamikee] Big news for ABAP developers. ABAP AI just keeps growing. Back in February, we announced that Joule speaks ABAP. Since then, there has been a wave of new AI-driven skills. Now, you can generate wrap business objects from the database table all the way to the UI service. You can create unit tests, explain code, complete code directly in the editor, and even implement validation and determination. These capabilities are already live in the SAP VTP ABAP environment and SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. And they're coming to S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition in the 2025 release. Even better, ABAP AI remains free of charge. The free promotions we introduced earlier this year have been extended until further notice. And here is another big step forward. ABAP AI will also become available for older S/4HANA private releases. Think of an AI service running side-by-side with their ABAP instance. That means you can benefit from the latest innovations without waiting for an upgrade. Want the full details? You can stay tuned for TechEd 2025. And if you want to read more on these release updates, the link is in the description below.

[Witalij] SAP Business Data Cloud, BDC, brings a data product-centric approach to managing business data. Each data product is a curated, semantically enriched package of business process data, harmonized and replicated from systems like SAP S/4HANA. For solution developers and architects among here, BDC offers a standardized platform to build, extend, and consume these data products, exposing them through APIs or events for integration with both SAP and third-party applications. To dive deeper, check out the SAP Business Data Cloud blog series, including the latest post on customer-managed data products. You'll see how to build a custom data product in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition using a custom CDS entity. There is also a dedicated series that walks through consuming data products in SAP Databricks for machine learning workflows and exposing them for inference. You'll find links to all these resources in the description. And as the Devtoberfest approaches, be sure to catch the sessions featuring product managers and the CTO of SAP Business Data Cloud.

[Daniel] SAP TechEd 2025 Berlin has just released the Agenda Builder, so you can now set your schedule for the event. Just scroll through all of the sessions, 250 keynotes, hands-on workshops, community talks, strategy talks, roadmaps and more. Select the ones that you like, click add to schedule and you're set to go. They are added to your dashboard. What's really great is that the sessions you would dream of missing are already in your schedule, like Key101, the Developer Keynote, run by a bunch of developer advocates you may recognize. If you're in Berlin, please drop by and say hello. If you can't make it to Berlin, you can still create an agenda for SAP TechEd Virtual, and the same Key101 Developer Keynote will be automatically added to your schedule. I love playing with the theme.

[Michelle]  Howdy y'all, everyone's favorite fall tech fest is just about to start. Devtoberfest 2025 kicks off on September 29th, which is only a few weeks away. Each day spotlights a different theme: ABAP, frontend tooling, AI, and more. As in years past, it's free and fully online, so jump in, earn points on the scoreboard, chase nirvana and put yourself in the running for the grand prize, which this year is a retreat to a future TechEd event and meet us developer advocates in person. Check out the post linked below for more info on the great sessions we've got coming up and the contest to see how you can win that fantastic grand prize. We hope you're just as excited to participate as we are to go live, and as always, happy coding!

entry.title: Focused Run Configuration - SAP HANA Segregation of Duties for Privileges Issue
entry.content:
Hi,

I‚Äôm currently working on a SAP Focused Run policy that should report non-compliant users that have both USER ADMIN and ROLE ADMIN privileges in the SAP HANA Database. 

Please let me if any of you have had similar requirements.  Also Please let me know if you see anything wrong with the policy.

 

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<targetsystem xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" desc="SOD TESTING NEW" id="ZTEST3" multisql="Yes" version="0000" xsi:schemaLocation="csa_policy.xsd">
<configstore name="HANA_SPECIAL_PRIVILIGES" sci_id="Z00002">
<checkitem desc="Check Privileges: Both USER ADMIN, ROLE ADMIN granted" id="ZPG_SECGRC_HAM14_01" not_found="positive">
<compliant>GRANTOR like '%' and PRIVILEGE in ('USER ADMIN', 'ROLE ADMIN') and GRANTEE_TYPE = 'USER' and IS_VALID like '%' and GRANTEE in ('SYSTEM','SAPHDB','SAPHANADB') and not (GRANTEE like '_SYS%') </compliant>
<noncompliant>GRANTOR like '%' and PRIVILEGE in ('USER ADMIN', 'ROLE ADMIN') and GRANTEE_TYPE = 'USER' and IS_VALID like '%' and not (GRANTEE in ('SYSTEM','SAPHDB','SAPHANADB')) and not (GRANTEE like '_SYS%')</noncompliant>
<joinstore name="HANA_SPECIAL_PRIVILIGES" no_data_found="Yes">
<joincompliant>GRANTOR like '%' and PRIVILEGE in ('USER ADMIN', 'ROLE ADMIN') and GRANTEE_TYPE = 'USER' and not (GRANTEE like '_SYS%') </joincompliant>
<joinnoncompliant>GRANTOR like '%' and PRIVILEGE in ('USER ADMIN', 'ROLE ADMIN') and GRANTEE_TYPE = 'USER' and not (GRANTEE like '_SYS%') </joinnoncompliant>
</joinstore>
</checkitem>
</configstore>
</targetsystem>

entry.title: Error while receiving with multiple batches which is assigned to multiple valuation types
entry.content:
We are currently facing an issue receiving multiple batches for material has split valuation. 

Error while receiving a split valuated material with multiple batches which is assigned to multiple valuation types

Material: XYZ (split valuation)
GR (MIGO)

Batch‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉValuation Type
TEST_001‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉTEST_001
TEST_002‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉTEST_002

entry.title: Approval Model Query Problem
entry.content:
Hi everyone,üò±

I'm encountering an issue with the approval process in SAP Business One. I've configured a query to trigger approval only when at least one item in a sales quotation has a gross profit percentage below 27%.

The query checks each line individually, not the overall gross profit of the document. The idea is:

  • If any item has a gross profit percentage below 27%, the approval should be triggered.
  • If all items have a gross profit percentage above 27%, the approval should not be triggered ‚Äî even if the total gross profit is affected by other items.

However, the main problem is that the approval still gets triggered even when all items have a gross profit percentage higher than 27%. I've also tested using other fields like StickPrice and LineTotal, but the issue persists.

It seems like the system is evaluating the total gross profit or applying the condition incorrectly. Has anyone faced this behavior or found a reliable way to ensure the approval only activates when at least one item falls below the threshold?

My actual query is this but i tried differents query fields but nothing.

SELECT DISTINCT 'TRUE' FROM OQUT T0  INNER JOIN QUT1 T1 ON T0."DocEntry" = T1."DocEntry"      
WHERE T1."DocEntry" = T0."DocEntry"
AND T1."LineTotal"  > 0
AND T1."StickPrice" > 0
AND T1."Quantity" > 0 
AND ((T1."LineTotal" - (T1."Quantity" * T1."StickPrice"))   / NULLIF (T1."LineTotal", 0)) * 100 < 27

Version Sap 9.3 

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: RSB4HTRF - Transfer of scenarios - Do we run it directly in Production?
entry.content:
Hello team,  

We are starting our movement from BW 7.5 (On HANA) to BW/4HANA. So far so good, we used transaction RSB4HTRF (In-place) in Sandbox to migrate couple scenarios with success, including the data was there with no problem.

I found some old discussions, stating we need to execute the transaction RSB4HTRF in each system (Dev, QA and Prod). I could not find a way to transport the process itself and not only the objects converted, which I believe will just clean up our production system.

Please, anyone did In-place migration and had experience on this part?

Thank you,

Marcelo

thanks in advance

regards,
Anvesh

entry.title: Re: Using SAP CPI to Perform POST Calls on SAP Datasphere OData API
entry.content: Hi @Gowtham_Sundar, for the purpose of reading data from SAP Datasphere OData API, can you let me know what purpose (Interactive Usage / API Access/ Technical User) have you used in datasphere while creating OAuth2 client for SAP CPI? and how you managed to control the access at space level?
